title: FS:  T206 Frank Smith Chicago & Boston Polar Bear PSA 3
author: Marty

posts.post_title: FS:  T206 Frank Smith Chicago & Boston Polar Bear PSA 3
posts.post_content:
For sale is a T206 Frank Smith, Chicago & Boston variation with a Polar Bear back, graded PSA 3.  Asking $120.00.  Shipping included.  Checks, money orders, and PayPal accepted (buyer to pay any PayPal fees associated with this transaction).

Marty
